sections.heading: not specified.An action for relief not otherwise provided for in Chapter 25 can only be brought within four years after the cause of action shall have accrued
applicable to civil actions only. Mercer v. City of Omaha, 76 Neb. 289, 107 N.W. 565 (1906).
sections.text: applicable to civil actions only. Mercer v. City of Omaha, 76 Neb. 289, 107 N.W. 565 (1906).
